text: Apple will release its biggest iPad ever with a display of at least 16 inches...
full-pick-text: Apple will release its biggest iPad ever with a display of at least 16 inches. It won't be OLED, it'll have the front-facing camera on the landscape side, and two USB-C ports at least. It'll be called iPad Studio.
notes: • "... It won't be OLED, it'll have the front-facing camera on the landscape side, and two USB-C ports at least. It'll be called iPad Studio."
